message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds significant worth to me, but I believe it could be an exceptional addition to your collection or business. Before we proceed, I would like to extend a special offer tailored just for you. If you're interested in exploring this opportunity further, please consider my proposal of $15000 for the product. I understand that value is subjective and varies from person to person, so should you find this price acceptable, we can move forward with the transaction. Looking forward to your response.
